name: 施欣文
objective: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
schedule: See the detailed description from the course calendar hard copy. You will have three major papers (all with revisions) and several less formal writing assignments.
scorePolicy:
Formal Papers: 50%
Homework and quizzes: 20%
Informal Writing, Peer Reviews, and Informal Presentations: 10%
Final Exam: 10%
Participation: 10%
